website_summaries.verdict: The absolute best option if you're looking for a training seat. It's more expensive, but you're paying for a high-quality product.
pros: Sports a contoured design that the helps baby sit in an upright position
Made of soft polyurethane for optimal comfort
cons: A tray is available, but you have to buy it separately
The seat is snug for large babies

customer_reviews.title: More like for 3 months old ONLY
customer_reviews.text: This seat is TINY!!! The description says it fits babies 3-9 months old. More like for 3 months old ONLY. I have an older Bumbo which my 7 month old fits great (it was a hand-me down). I ordered this one for my new nephew, and it is MUCH MUCH smaller. I can't find another size online, does Bumbo now only make this 1 size? If so, do not buy if your baby is bigger than 12 lbs or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for chubby babies
customer_reviews.text: I had to return item the next day. This seat is SO CUTE but NOT MADE FOR CHUBBY FAT BABIES! I think my son was 3-4 months and could barely squeeze his chubby thighs thru. Its probably great for little, petite babies but not great for the chubby ones.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the size!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a bumbo with my babies so this time it was a must. My baby is 3 months old & is 15 pounds so I ordered one. And his little legs can barely fit in it. It's not like he's really chubby. I can't believe how small it is. I wish I had read the reviews better before I purchased. He will not be able to use it for very long. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 3 month baby that even being ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 3 month baby that even being so little she just wants to be sitting down. I also got her the tray and toy and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: maria g morales

customer_reviews.title: A real Mom's advice for larger babies.
customer_reviews.text: My son hated this from the first time we put him in it... (He was only 3 months the first time) If you have a larger baby don't bother. The leg holes will squeeze their thighs. I recommend ANY other seat that doesn't have that (slightly separated) circular opening for the legs. Look for more of a "U" shape & you'll be good to go for a while! He loves the other one we bought that's not so enclosed.
customer_reviews.author: Zen Mom

customer_reviews.title: Mommy helper for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a help, our girl is so nosey, doesn't like to be held facing you, doesn't want to be laying somewhere.. BUMBO to the rescue! I agree, seatbelts are stupid, in a terrible place..and oddly the buckle your right hand opens is hard to open! She's not quite 3 months, so it's perfect.. now. She will outgrow it before long i'm sure! As a mom- you may not want to spend the $, if it's a gift, get it early.. they will LOVE and appreciate it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The product is so small and tight, it doesnt last long at all. It seems like a child may only be able to use it 2, maybe 3 months from the time you can first start putting them in it, before they are too big to fit in it comfortably anymore. If that is just natural, and expected, then I would argue the price point is way to high for what you get out od it. If it weren't for that, I would think it was a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Von Barger

customer_reviews.title: Here is the deal with this thing... ...
customer_reviews.text: Here is the deal with this thing ... it comes in two pieces, not one. I am assuming due to simplicity in manufacturing and packing, this makes for an inconvenience when installing and removing it, the tray becomes detached from the base and you have to start over again while trying to keep an active baby on the bumbo. Not too impressed to tell you the truth, also once the baby is in the seat with the tray if they push up they can bump up the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Tonatiuh Fernandez Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves this seat. We use it all the time. She enjoys feeling like she is a part of the family because the family will sit on the floor and watch a movie together and she will be right there with us. Our daughter is a preemie and she will be 4 mos on the 9th of May. She is very tiny but fits very good in this chair. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Babybluelv01

customer_reviews.title: Stays on perfect! Snaps right onto the seat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the chair and tray from the same place. TRAY STAYS ON PERFECT IF YOU SNAP IT ON RIGHT (see pics). I was worried about buying the tray because of the reviews. Once I received it, I put the tray on and yea it seemed to fall right off. Then I realized the tray SNAPS ON THE CHAIR. I snapped the tray into place (bottom of the seat) and it stays on very well. I can put a good 3-4lbs of pressure with my hand on the top of the tray and the tray stays on fine. No issues, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: One of a Kind Seat for Babies
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat for my baby. He has learned to sit up better and straighter in this seat. It also builds his neck muscles. It holds him in very well. I usually put my son in this seat while we are eating so he can be near us and still see us. I bought this in conjunction with the. He enjoys playing with his toys while in this seat. The only negative I have found is that it can be a little difficult at times to get his legs pushed in the slots. I find that it makes it easier to move the center piece over to one side or another so his legs will go in easier.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love this color!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I finally found a color that wasn’t blue, pink or grey! It’s a pretty lavender color and matches my daughters room perfect. She fits in it now at 2 months with extra head support. My other two kids weren’t able to use this seat (different color) after 7 months because their legs were too chunky. So for a few months of having my daughter beside me on the counter- even though that may be frowned upon by some mom shamers out there- is worth every penny. It keeps her happy to feel like she’s a part of the action. A happy baby is a less stressed momma!
customer_reviews.author: mere

customer_reviews.title: Although it works for some babies, it did not work for my son.
customer_reviews.text: This was just another pointless baby purchase. Although it works for some babies (was very useful for my niece when she was an infant) it did not work for my son. He only fit in the seat when he was still too young to support himself in a seated position, so we didn't get to use it. Even though he was on the higher end of growth percentile, he was never particularly "chunky" yet his legs didn't fit properly in this seat. Luckily I was able to sell it since it was still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: Baby sat and was happy
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and so did my kid. She grew so fast and was able to sit up on her own unassisted very quickly so we did not get a lot of use out of it. She has very thick wonderful chubby squishy baby thighs and had no problems getting her in and out. It was a tight fit to put her legs in, but once they were in, she couldn't pull her legs out and scoot away!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a Bumbo seat.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it a 5 instead of a 4 because my wife and I were both surprised as to how big the actual tray is. We expected it to be about 30% smaller than it is. Highly recommend if you have a Bumbo seat (we got ours from Facebook for $15 in like new condition). I'm sure our 7 month old is glad she doesn't have to bend over at 35 degree angles to grab toys now. Perfect surface for suction toys, I'd say they stick better to this than our high chair table. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MeowMix

customer_reviews.title: Acid reflux? This helps!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has acid reflux really bad, so she loves sitting up... She is just barely 2 months old and we got this chair today. She was crying and I put her in and she was happy as can be. Sat in it for about 30 minutes, which is great for my squirmy little kiddo!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to take the two pieces apart and get them to click together, but getting it on and off the bumpo without separating them is also difficult. It was so difficult to separate the two pieces, that the hook underneath the top piece cracked so that it didn't stay together very well anymore. This happened after a couple weeks. Good idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Fegan

customer_reviews.title: not great for chunky babies
customer_reviews.text: I rate this product 4 stars mostly due to the placement of the safety buckles, they are right in the way of trying to place the baby inside. We had to remove the safety buckles in order for the baby to fit inside without it rubbing and pressing up against him. However, It would be close to impossible for the baby to get out of the seat due to how its designed. So I think the safety is just there for legalities rather than actual safety. Also probably not great for a chunkier baby. It fits our baby because his legs are longer and not so chunky but it leaves little room for leg growth.
customer_reviews.author: louEmerling

customer_reviews.title: Bumbo seats are a must!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bumbo seat! It's great that they have a variety of colors to choose from! We got the grey because it's more natural and if we have a girl next time then it won't matter. Plus, it looks great! The package was delayed a couple of days, but I wasn't in a huge hurry to get it, so I am not upset by that fact! The Bumbo seat is very durable and lasts forever. I had one with my first kid and it withstood everything a kid (and parent) can throw at it in daily life!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I love the bumbo
customer_reviews.text: I love the bumbo! However the one I bought didn't come with the tray so I was excited to purchase this item! The bumbo works great bringing to places when I need to feed my daughter however now that she likes to feed herself, I was excited to get the tray. I was so disappointed after trying this product one time! The top of the tray comes off SO EASY! My daughter took it off and it literally would not stay clipped to the bottom piece. Had to return product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy but small
customer_reviews.text: this is a great quality product, I just wish it came in different sizes. My baby is 5 months and only 15 lbs and I feel soon he wont be able to squeeze his legs in anymore. it serves its purpose for now, although my son is 50/50 whether he wants to be in it or not. He's going through a playing with his feet phase and gets upset when he feels stuck and cant reach them. But it is helping him sit up better and we are using this to feed him his first solids. Just keep in mind that if you purchase this you may not be able to use it as long as you wish.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the baby who can’t sit up all the way yet. He likes it. The material is soft and contouring. He leans over and it does not topple over. Of course I always supervise when he has seat time. You can wipe this down easily and lots of slack on the seat belt. The duck each color is perfectly neutral as I wanted turquoise; but got this color for cleanliness looking purposes. Glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay connected
customer_reviews.text: I originally the bumbo seat so I thought this would be perfect. The first one I bought I thought was broken because it would not stay on the seat so I had it replaced. The same thing with the second one. When I try to connect it to the seat the two pieces disconnect. I gave up after a bunch of times of trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: the baby's legs are thick so we have to pop in his legs into the bumbo. it works. the baby can't get out of it. the only bad thing is the middle attachment is so short that once the baby is in the bumbo, i have a hard time getting a hold of it in order to secure the seat belt. nonetheless, it does work, it's soft, and it doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long for my chunky baby
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really great product I have no complaints about the chair itself, I just have a chunky baby so she can’t use it as long as I would like. She’s 4mo 15lbs and I would say she had good use of it for a month. I do wanna mention the time she could use it, it annoying to get her in it cause it has buckles so I had to get the buckles around her chunky muffin top lol plus I had to tuck her thighs in so yeah it’s perfect for petite babies.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tray we’ve tried!! I’m so frustrated about it. We can’t even get it to stay on the seat nor together (tray has two pieces). It hasn’t been used and now I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jelayne

customer_reviews.title: 5lbs) and her legs were too chubby to fit comfortably into the leg slots
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for my 4 month old baby (16.5lbs) and her legs were too chubby to fit comfortably into the leg slots. It was too snug and the whole thing just looks uncomfortable. She also refuses to sit in it for very long. Doesn't appear very safe to plop my baby into this either as she can easily tumble over with the seat stuck onto her butt.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected and then some!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why there are so many bad reviews. This is exactly what I expected it to be! I was worried it wouldn’t fit my version of the seat but it works perfectly. It just slides on top of the part between the baby’s legs and then secures by hooking over the edge of the bottom of the seat. I love that it secures at the bottom making it difficult for her to pull off. So easy to put on! So much more available now that we have this tray! I should’ve bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, poor strap design.
customer_reviews.text: We had an older version of the Bumbo for our first child which did not have any straps. I understand the addition for safety, however, the location of the center buckle strap is poor. It’s hard to hold the buckle up while also putting the child in. Because of the snug fit, it’s hard to fish the strap out after the child is put in. Wish the strap was better designed. Otherwise, the seat works great.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: mine won't stay together
customer_reviews.text: The tray and the leg/arm thing that connects to the base of the bumbo comes apart to easily. There a little notch that is suppose to keep it in place and mine is rounded so it's not securing the pieces together enough. Overall, it's great for infants that can't sit up on their own yet. It allows them to play and gives them a chance to sit up for a little while and not look at the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: I love this product for babies before they're sitting up but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for babies before they're sitting up but once they have head control. I never leave the room when my baby is sitting in it. It makes getting ready in the morning and making dinner so much easier when my baby can sit and watch me. I give her lots of playtime on the floor and tummy time, but eventually she gets bored of that and that's when I use the Bumbo. It's also great for starting solids when she can't sit in a highchair yet.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Handmade

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great support for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is by far my favorite baby accessory. It helps my kid learn to sit up on her own. I use this every day. When I’m cooking, doing the dishes, even when I shower. I always put her in safe places. And where I can see her. But she absolutely loves being able to sit up and look around. I ended up buying 4 for my friends that are all about to have babies.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Crissman

customer_reviews.title: I’ve done super glue it 4 times with 2 different glues
customer_reviews.text: The angle the tray fits, pushes the little click tab to break. I’ve done super glue it 4 times with 2 different glues. I would say to just invest a high chair. And I just graduated from from college in may with a degree in industrial electrician. Save money and buy high chair. Little tab doesn’t hold. And I don’t lie ever, your word and handshake is all I GOT. And I’ll add photos! Graduated with a 3.46gpa
customer_reviews.author: A Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It’s helped my 4 month old get control of his neck, head and chest. I also ordered the tray that attaches to it and that is also a great thing to have if you have a bumbo. I ordered them separately and got them faster rather than ordering the set
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Kimmell

customer_reviews.title: A bit hard to take my baby out of this thing. But hey... she eats with us now! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Its a great seat for my little one. Holds her Snug so that she doesn't tip over. I love it. I get to have her next to us while we eat. We have a square table and we put her right in the middle. She doesn't have to be in the play pen all alone anymore. Word of caution if you plan the same keep toys out their hands or you'll be picking up food when they throw it. Only draw back is when taking them out, it's so snug it looks like you may hurt them. Just make sure their legs are loose before picking them up and they should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones who are still not sitting
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for feeding my 4 month old before he could sit unsupported. We are still using it at 6 months when he is sitting well. He does try to climb out of it so the tray table became very useful/necessary. We even put it up on the centre of our sturdy wooden dining table so he can join us at meal times. This way I don't think we will need a high chair for a while.
customer_reviews.author: B A Hassanain

customer_reviews.title: Light weight yet durable!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Love that it attaches and comes off so effortlessly and is extremely light weight yet durable. 4 month old loves it and my 3 year old loves the fact that I can put the baby in the Bumbo with some toys and I don't have to have her in my lap and she can be more actively involved. The one downside is that it did have a funny smell, but the one I also purchased and returned at Target had the same smell. After a little warm soap and water it no longer smelled.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Bumbo is great for helping infants learn to sit up
customer_reviews.text: The bumbo has been great for my family. I can put my infant in the bumbo and strap her in. She loves that it helps her sit up on her own. The bumbo is sturdy to a certain extent, I wouldn’t leave a infant unsupervised. I’m a little hesitant that if I were to set her on top of a table In the bumbo and feed her that she could fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but tight leg holes
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be great if baby fits. We had to return ours because Baby’s legs wouldn’t fit, though average size for 4 months. We have the other version, with tray, and it works well but we would have preferred this solid and seemingly easier to clean version.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchase the chair for my 2 month old granddaughter who weighs 10 pounds. She really enjoys sitting up in her chair. Thinks she is a big girl. She does have good control of her neck. I cant buckle her up, bec cant really get to the buckle while she is sitting. Personally, don't need to be buckle since chair is staying in one location. Zendayah is very happy with her chair
customer_reviews.author: PPA

customer_reviews.title: Very tight thigh space
customer_reviews.text: The 3 point harness is very awkwardly places especially the groin strap. I cannot clip it in place so we barely used this product. The product says 3-12 months but I can barely push my 3 month olds thighs in place. I am not sure this product is worth the money a high charity with back support works much better!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Tray keeps popping off
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it was bad luck, but our tray just would not latch itself together strong enough to keep my five month old from yanking it upward into his own face. Upon inspection, it seems the latching notch was ever-so-slightly too low on the stand to actually secure the two pieces together. Very frustrating. So useless for feeding we chucked it after or first week of solid foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kate O.

customer_reviews.title: Cute color Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The color is cute but my child grunts everytime he’s in it almost like it’s pushing on his tummy but he’s not chubby so I don’t get it. The seatbelts are the dumbest thing ever they just cut into his sides and it says keep them buckled at all times but the way it’s designed they can’t get out without your help so I just cut them off.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it. Her chunk thighs did prove to be ...
customer_reviews.text: This really came in handy. My daughter loved it. Her chunk thighs did prove to be a problem at times, but the material is flexible. Very easy to clean. Only side note, don't plan on posting it on Craigslist when you are done with it. Apparently, "child" and "bum"(bo) are a big No No! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Breaks very fast.
customer_reviews.text: We used this bumbo tray for a little less than a week before it broke. I'm not happy at all with it. Year's ago bumbo trays were one piece. These one's are 2 pieces. They are difficult to get on and your baby can just pull the top part off. Can't get it to stay together anymore. Packaging was nice and it came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make the thigh holes bigger or make it adjustable would be great
customer_reviews.text: This is not for chubby babies. I got this for my nephew. (Hes 4- 5 months old) hes chunky but I didnt think we'd have a hard time getting him in and out. It looked like it was cutting off the circulation to his legs. Sad to say but we had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Hien Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: LEAVES RED MARKS!
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend the Bumbo! My biggest complaint is, the buckles leave red marks on my baby's legs!!! It's hard to get her out of it. My baby's not even that chunky, she's only in the 50th percentile for her height and weight and the Bumbo is small for her.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Love this bumbo. Such a life saver. Nice pretty colors to choose from. Good quality, smooth and easy to use. My baby loves to sit in it because of the support it gives her(she just doesn't know it). Four stars instead of 5 only because the seatbelt is a little hard to get off. Maybe mine is a little defected, because only the right side of the clip is hard to unfasten.??....
customer_reviews.author: Maleah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but look for cheaper price
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product EXCEPT after I bought it, I found it cheaper at a store nearby. Not the worst since I had fast delivery w/ Amazon but I wish I would’ve shopped around first. My LO is 3 months now and just starting to try to sit up. This is perfect to help gain neck strength and the recommended ages are from 3-18 months. A friend cautioned it might not last that long bc the leg holes are a little narrow for when their thighs get really chubby.
customer_reviews.author: darling7

customer_reviews.title: Low Rating
customer_reviews.text: I can't bring myself to rate this any higher. I purchased one of these because so many of my friends said it was a must have. Well chunky baby moms beware, my son was never able to use this. The leg holes are too freaking small. By the time he could hold his head up, his chunky legs were too big to even use this. Waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brenbear

customer_reviews.title: Staple baby product everyone should have
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this product and everyone with a baby who is on the verge of sitting up or can sit up needs one. Lightness to move from room to room while holding your baby, handiness of the spaces its able to fit and just all around a wonderful handy, time saving product!
customer_reviews.author: Ci

customer_reviews.title: Not for chubby babies
customer_reviews.text: Overall, liked the idea of the seat but it's not designed for chubby babies. Bought the seat for my 4 months old who was in the 75th percentile sizewise. Used the seat only once. It was hard to put him in the seat and then taking him out of it as his chunky thighs and diapered booty were stuck. It wasn't easy to pry him out of it. I might have missed a weight or size limit in the description when I was purchasing the seat, though the recommended age ranged up to 12 months. I cannot imagine forcing my now 6 months old into the seat 😂 he would have to stay in it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya Wollenberg

customer_reviews.title: Love our bumbo
customer_reviews.text: Love our bumbo! We use it to feed our 5 month old baby food instead of a high chair. Plus you can take it anywhere! We took out the safety belt because it was such a nuisance and like anything else use common sense when placing your child in it. I see us using it and it lasting for children to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple tray
customer_reviews.text: I registered for and received a Bumbo seat at my baby shower. Being a first time mom, I didn’t really know what I would need/want. My 6-month old is just starting to use his Bumbo seat, and it’s great to use for feeding since he just started solids a month ago. However, I’ve seen many other friends with similar seats that have trays attached and I was really wishing I had got one of those instead. However, I found out about this tray and it works great! Exactly what I wanted. It easily clips onto the Bumbo seat and is the perfect size tray for feeding or playing!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for babies who can't quite sit on their own ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for babies who can't quite sit on their own yet. Absolutely love the bumbo seat and buy it for every shower! Would recommend to every expecting mom!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the Bumbo
customer_reviews.text: We love the bumbo ! This color is on point. So easy to clean and very convenient for keeping the little guy close before he can sit up unassisted. He is 3 months and he plays with small items in this, I use it to sit him on the kitchen counter where he can see me while i cook, etc. Essential for all littles.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bumbo seat!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for my son, but had gotten rid of it. I wanted another one for my baby girl. Since my son loved his so much! My daughter is only 3 months old and around 13lbs. She loves to be in a sitting position. Now she's happy. So she can sit up with everyone else. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kennysmom

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this did not work with my 3-month old. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this did not work with my 3-month old. The new ones have a safety strap but the placement of the center buckle is in a weird place, and it makes it difficult to grab from under my son once he's finally sitting in it. The leg openings also seem to be very tight, so this will not work for babies with meaty thighs ;)
customer_reviews.author: PvM

customer_reviews.title: The chair is great but maybe too tight for grownups?
customer_reviews.text: My 5 months boy is bigger than average (he’s closer to 9/10 months ones) and the chair is too tight for his knees. It’s hard to pull him out of it and he almost cannot love his legs. His back is very well sustained though.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Mares

customer_reviews.title: Not for 90th percentile babes
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love the bumbo. We spend a lot of time outside with family and with a 2 year old also I need to be able to put down my 4 month old sometimes! This was an easy solution because it’s light- can just throw in the car to go anywhere and have somewhere to safely put little man. Well, unfortunately he could barely fit in this seat (supposedly meant for 3-12 months) at barely 4 months old. My babies are blessed to be in the 90th and above percentile and I imagine any baby who is above 50th would have trouble squeezing in!
customer_reviews.author: melissa Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of high chairs but I love the convenience of the table top. I was gifted a Bumbo and purchased this tray for it and it is perfect! Easy to pop on and off but still sturdy. Baby loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great place for those under 6 months to "sit on their own" and strengthen those muscles. And for the baby to join us on the dining table for dinner. And when he learns to sit, a good booster seat the the table.
customer_reviews.author: marciam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my baby's Bumbo perfectly. I purchased a play appuratus (it has suction cups) that was on clearance at Target. I didn't realize that I needed a tray to put it on (pregnancy brain). I ordered it via Prime. It came quickly and works well with the toy. I like to use it to feed her cereal as well. I also am less worried about her being able to get out by herself. (Never leave child unattended! )
customer_reviews.author: Partyof6

customer_reviews.title: Great product but can break easily
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with this tray but it broke shortly after I purchased it. Not very sturdy my daughter pushed down in the tray when sitting in her chair and it broke where the tray and lower portion connect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat. Daughter didn’t like it tho, clips were hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter didn’t like this at all. She always tried to get her legs out so it’s just her I’m sure. Also the clip was hard to get on and off. It was nice to be able to set these seat up on a table or carry her in it to take her to the other room. Just didn’t work out for us.
customer_reviews.author: de Chavez Capital

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but too snug for chubby 9 mo. old
customer_reviews.text: The improved it since I bought one for a grandson 12 years ago. The safety belt and tray are nice to have. I bought it for 9 month chubby grand baby, but it was too tight for her and daughter-in-law did not want to use it. I will give it to our 1st great grand baby at birth.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: My baby isn't that big and he still had a tough time getting in and out. It was uncomfortable for him. I had to return it. There are lots of awesome fabric chairs I would recommend instead of this one.
customer_reviews.author: n0m3rcy

customer_reviews.title: Our children never liked to sit in it.
customer_reviews.text: I ve tried this for both of my children. It’s ok if you want your baby to practice sitting. Both our children didn’t like to sit in it for more than a couple of minutes. So both times I ve ended up returning it after a month. It is kind of expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie624

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I took the buckle out because it just gets in the way. If you plan on leaving your child unattended to need the buckle you probably need a Nanny not the chair lol. Love this chair! Helped my daughter sit up easily. I bought the tray and she used both comfortably from 3.5 months to 7 months. At 7 months she started climbing out so we gave to a friend. The material stays nice though even with everyday use. Easy to clean, use and move around the house with one hand. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Meadows

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended for my grandson who needed to work on his ...
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended for my grandson who needed to work on his core/trunk muscle strength. I bought it with the tray and the toy that sticks on the tray. It has been fantastic for him. However, chunky baby thighs might not fit in the leg spaces. I bought it with the tray and the toy that sticks that on the tray. It has been fantastic for him. However, if you are dealing with chunky baby thighs, you might be able to carve out some foam to make more room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Buckles get in the way otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the buckles, the middle one wouldn’t stay up to put my 6 month old in but the sides would drape over and stay up, so it was kind of a pain. Otherwise it’s great, super sturdy. Supports her well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money, bumBo seat is great but the tray is a waste. It never stays on, it’s super hard to put on. My child is 5 month and could pull it off the seat. It’s not secure at all. Mommies save your money get a real high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Yalei-3

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sturdy, soft, portable, and so many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can put child in and he is supported to sit and not fall over. Can use it for so many places. But...i do not like the placement of the middle seatbelt strap. When I put child in the seat I have to try and dig out the middle strap from underneath child to be able to buckle him in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great for alertness and ab muscle growth
customer_reviews.text: Well if little man would stop growing this would be amazing!!! We had these for all of our kids. Before they did not have the straps. Nice addition. The one that we had before they had a recall on it and sent us the straps. That one was in turn given away. Then number 5 came! Time for another Bumbo! He loves sitting up now and thanks to the bumbo he is a happier camper!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A. Raviele

customer_reviews.title: Tray is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I love the bumbo seat but the tray that I purchased with it sucks. The tray is too small to attach properly to the seat. The tray is a two piece system that clicks together. When I try to attach the tray to the seat it comes apart and is useless. What I’m really upset with is that in my opinion it’s too expensive for what it is and for it to not work makes me mad because that’s money down the drain. The bumbo seat itself is great but if you want a tray to go with it find something else to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but it doesn't fit large babies in the age range
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good chair for about 3 days but it wouldn't fit my five month old. I guess he was too fat or the chair was too small, so we really didn't get to use it that much because I have a large baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mighell

customer_reviews.title: Nice but breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan but unfortunately there is a flaw to this tray table product. There is a small home that allows the tray to lock to it's second part. The plasticitet rim between these two snapped on both of our tables. (We have twins). One snapped already after 5 days, the other after a month. They are still usable, just pop apart easily which is a bit annoying. We are still huge fans of the Bumbo seats. But this tray table needs a design improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Pernilla Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for chubby babies
customer_reviews.text: Would LOVE this product if my child could fit in it...granted the girl has some chunky monkey thighs on her, but you cant tell me most babies aren't chubby?! I would try pulling the the leg area apart so that she could slip in but you can clearly tell it's just not comfortable for her. She could only sit in it for very short periods of time before she would start getting fussy. I do like how it's lightweight and washes easy.
customer_reviews.author: J-Tweeje81

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of this item. It’s a pain to get in and out of. And my baby always wound up hunched over. Just wait til they grow into the one for 6 months up. If you just wanna sit them up, try the fisher price floor seat. Better support. Easy in and out. This was a waste of money. Wish I didn’t get rid of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Commisso

customer_reviews.title: But it detaches from the bottom part to the top tray.
customer_reviews.text: It really sucks that it disconnects if you’re not careful attaching it to the seat. If you’re familiar with Bumbo, you have to first apply the top of the tray and then “stretch” the bottom to the seat. If you’re not careful, the top tray detaches from the bottom part of the tray. It can get frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for taller/larger babies.
customer_reviews.text: This a great product but it's not meant for larger/taller babies. At 6 mos my baby was 18lbs and 26". She barely squeezed into the seat. It was also hard to pop her out without prying her legs out one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: KomptonWest

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. My 4 month old loves sitting in it (supervised of course). We will be using this for awhile. I will be bringing it to restaurants with me so she doesn’t have to use their booster seats. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The color is brighter than expected. It’s hard to clean the safety straps, and if your baby has chubby thighs they get stuck lifting them out. Otherwise this is the best thing for the in between stages.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda F.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for chunky babies
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help my daughter at the dinner table. The leg holes are to small to fit her chubby legs, It is difficult to get her out of the seat. we don't need the buckles any more for her so we did remove them. I don't know if I will be able to get them back in if ever needed but her legs fit so firmly she cant get out on her own any ways. Had I know what I know now I would not have gotten this. If you have a chunky baby skip this.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Not for chubby babies
customer_reviews.text: Not for babies with chubby thighs. My baby maybe only sat in this for like 1 week. He was 3 months when I got this and he out grew it quickly! Honestly a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Shiann

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tray for Bumbo Seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in conjunction with the. This allows my son to be able to put his toys or food on the tray while sitting in the Bumbo seat. He really likes being able to reach all of his items on his tray. I even have a few toys for him that have suction cups on it and it sticks to this tray very well. It's pretty easy to put together although it can be a little tricky at times.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, easy to install tray. Don't believe all the negative feedback posted in some reviews. Clip on after seating baby, take off before removing baby as instructions specify. One would think idiot-proof... The tray itself makes feeding baby much cleaner. Foods stick to tray rather than legs. Handy!
customer_reviews.author: Loren E. Clive

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy because of size
customer_reviews.text: Cute little chair if you have a child that doesnt weigh more that about 10 lbs! And at that time he wouldnt be sitting up anyhow. This chair was a great idea but my grandson is about 20 lbs and his little butt barely fit in there. It is MUCH tinier than I expected and it came in a box that I could have put one of my kitchen chairs into. Huge!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie89

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: What would I do in life without my Bumba. I take it everywhere and it’s so convenient. Baby loves it. The only problem is over time the beige turned kinda yellowing as if it was dirty but tried wiping it several times and it still has that color. Wish they would fix that. But still a mommy life saver.
customer_reviews.author: XOXO

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the bumbo seat. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because it's really hard to get her in with the buckles. I appreciate that the buckles are there but they're super annoying at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah June

customer_reviews.title: This would be great if I had bought it the moment my kid ...
customer_reviews.text: Leg openings are too tight on my 4 mo old. This would be great if I had bought it the moment my kid started holding his head up at 3 mo old. Basically, you will get 1 or 2 mo usefulness depending on the size of your baby. Don't bother if your child is in the higher percentile weight and/or length.
customer_reviews.author: jason deaver

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Nice little seat. Not sure why so expensive....but the baby wants to sit up so it works. Made in South Africa which surprised me but okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Action packed, great read

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Snug
customer_reviews.text: I have a chubby little fella and this seat is a bit snug but I think it's supposed to be like that in order to keep him upright, he loves being in the chair and it has helped him learn to sit up.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Go to item for babies who are starting to sit up on their own. A little hard on them so I wouldn’t use this product for long, but it’s super easy to clean and use. You can’t go wrong with one!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great baby gift!
customer_reviews.text: Suitable for babies 3-4 months to 6-8 months depending upon size, to sit it to play on floor or under supervision on the table while feeding the child. My twin grandsons were a scream and a half in them, singing , making up songs to get them to open their little mouths for food. I give these as baby gifts.
customer_reviews.author: R. Francois

customer_reviews.title: I would still use it if I could find it) they are very sturdy and hold up very well
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing a Bumbo tray (I purchased one 8 years ago with my first child, I would still use it if I could find it) they are very sturdy and hold up very well. This tray was purchased to go on an 8 yr old Bumbo, that I had saved from my first child. This tray fit perfectly and does its job. It cleans up well and is very easy to wipe clean. I would recommend this to any mom!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Will be great in a few months
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other reviewers, I found that the tray was very simple to attach - first curve the top "clip" around Bumbo middle and then push the bottom "lip" under the Bumbo bottom. Currently my baby is 3 months, so it is not very useful because he cannot really grab toys with control - however, in just a month or two this tray will be great. Pros: - Great idea, good for playtime and mealtime (when out) - Works well with Bumbo, good fit. Cons: - I thought I was going to break the plastic when snapping the pieces together
customer_reviews.author: JennKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This one was my replacement, ordered the first time and wrong color was sent. However the replacement was the correct color and just what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a bumbo!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to make a small portable high chair. Fits the bumbo great and not hard to put on. Comes in two pieces to make travel even easier. Wipes down very easily too! Couldn’t ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: J Lander

customer_reviews.title: BUY USED!
customer_reviews.text: SUGGESTION: buy these guys used. I found one at a consignment sale for $4, brought it home and used a magic eraser to clean it and it’s brand new now!
customer_reviews.author: LukeandLillianConley

product_meta.title: Bumbo Floor Seat, Ultimate Sitting Support, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueThe award-winning Bumbo Floor Seat is the preferred choice of millions of moms and dads as their baby's first seat and has become a parenting essential. The Bumbo Floor Seat enables your baby to maintain a sitting position on the floor, allowing you to play with, read to, and feed your baby. The Bumbo Floor Seat should not be used until your baby can support his or her head. To prevent falls, never use on a raised surface and always stay with and watch your baby. At Bumbo, we believe every child deserves a bright future. For more than a decade, we have made high-quality infant and toddler products that help your little ones sit up on their own, step up to places they can't yet reach, and build up their confidence as they gain independence. Our products solve everyday parenting challenges, while encouraging parent and child interaction and quality family time.
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE SUPPORT: This Bumbo baby floor seat is designed for comfort and support. Its deep seating surface and elevated leg openings support a baby in the upright position.
EASY TO CLEAN: This lightweight foam is simple to clean and can be easily cleaned using a damp cloth. Saving you much time and effort.
ENCOURAGES GOOD POSTURE: With a deep seat and high leg openings the baby floor seat supports the development of a baby. Allowing them to sit in the correct upright postion
SAFTEY HARNESS: Designed to secure and not be restrictive, this three point saftey harness offers comfort and protection for your baby
DURABLE: Unlike some foam, the foam used to make the Bumbo floor seat does not rip or tear easily. Making it strong and long-lasting.
Help your baby sit upright – This floor seat helps your baby sit up during playtime, feeding time, and story time.
Use while on the go – The durable, low-density foam is lightweight and easy to transport. Bring with you on playdates, vacations, picnics, and anywhere else you travel with your child.
Designed for your baby’s posture – The soft, contoured seat provides your baby with support and comfort while they sit upright for floor activities.
Restraint belt included – Keeps your baby safe by preventing them from falling forward.
Safe use – Don’t use until your baby can raise their head on their own. To prevent falls, never use on a raised surface and always stay with and watch your baby.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,636 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
